created_at.description: Timestamp of when the sub-department is created, specified in the date-time format.

deleted.description:
Specifies whether the sub-department is still a valid categorization in the organization.
Possible values: true, false

id.description: Identifier of the sub-department object, auto-generated when a new sub-department is created in the Freshteam system.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of when the sub-department’s name was last modified, specified in the date-time format.
